questions.question: Consider the following C program. The output of the given C program is ________. (Answer in integer)

Consider the following C program. Assume that the input to the program from the command line is 1234 followed by a newline character. Which one of the following statements is CORRECT?
options: The program will terminate with no output
The program will terminate with 4321 as output
The program will terminate with 1234 as output
questions.answer: The program will terminate with 4321 as output

Consider the following ANSI C code segment. Assume that the variable y points to a struct (allocated on the heap) containing two fields f1 and f2, and the local variables x, y, z, p, q, and i are allotted registers. Common sub-expression elimination (CSE) optimization is applied on the code. Consider the following ANSI C program.Which one of the following options is correct?
options: The program will not compile successfully
The program will compile successfully and output 10 when executed
The program will compile successfully and output 8 when executed
The program will compile successfully and output 13 when executed
questions.answer: The program will compile successfully and output 10 when executed
